meaningMnemonic: One <radical>animal</radical> that is particularly  <radical>good</radical> is the <kanji>wolf</kanji>. Wolves have a bad reputation, but actually they're very, very good animals.
readingMnemonic: A <kanji>wolf</kanji> might be good, but if you run into one, all you can do is scream <reading>Oh 神</reading>!” (おおかみ).
